text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Hundreds dead in Hajj stampede
text.summary: On January 12, 2006, 345 Muslim pilgrims were killed in a stampede at Jamarat Bridge near Mecca as they were participating in the annual Hajj pilgrimage, when luggage from a bus tripped some of the pilgrims, who were then crushed by the wave of people behind them.
